full_summary:
### Disposal of the Vessel Lynda Hindman

**Tender Reference:**
T4110-220006/A

**Public Agency:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of Transport Canada

**Purpose:**
The Government of Canada is seeking to engage with suppliers to explore the options for the disposal of the vessel Lynda Hindman.

**Supply Arrangement:**
This tender announcement is made in accordance with the Trade Agreement (None). Suppliers interested in submitting a bid are invited to participate.

**Requirements:**
The Crown is seeking information and options regarding the disposal of the Lynda Hindman vessel. Delivery will be in accordance with the terms specified above.

**Key Details:**

* **Contracting Agency Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Andrea Major
	+ Mailbox: andrea.major@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (403) 796-3230
* ** Tender Documents:**
	+ Attachments are available on the Canada Buys website:
		- English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/e944672c75213413db1e13cf2ff92266/ABES.PROD.PW_MER.B005.E28847.EBSU001.PDF>
		- French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/e2a317376e6040e092cb72ded0714588/ABES.PROD.PW_MER.B005.F28847.EBSU001.PDF>
* **Response Deadline:**
The tender closing date is February 24, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time).

**Submission Instructions:**
Suppliers interested in responding to this tender announcement may submit their bid electronically.

* **Language of Submission:**
Documents may be submitted in either of the official languages of Canada (English or French).

**Key Links:**
Please refer to the Canada Buys website for additional information and clarification on this tender notification:

*English: <https://buyandsell.gc.ca/cds/tender/notifications/T4110-202200006/T4110-202200006-notification-eng.pdf>
*French: <https://achatsetvends.gc.ca/acquis-desentreprises/avis-dappel/appeledoffre.aspx?id_appel=3216308947>

Tenders should be submitted by February
